page.title: 19Brunton Lane
page.content: {Brunton lane}leads from Brunton park estate,the area surrounding Brunton lane is mainly farmland.Therefore most of the houses situated here are mainly farmhouses. Just past Brunton park estate some of the farm buildings have been converted into{cottages}and have been sold. A lot of the other{farmhouses}have been modernised and there is also a group of very new houses (detached) situated on one farm, which was the Middle Brunton West and east farm. Altogether on Brunton lane there are 2 old farmhouses, 1 large modern farmhouse,5 terraced, 4 cottages and 2 detached farmhouses. Most of these were{pre-war}although modernisation had taken place.
